茹.definition: to eat; (extended meaning) to endure; putrid smell; vegetables; roots (inextricably attached to the plant)

茹古涵今.definition: to take in (old and new experiences and sorrows)

茹毛飲血.definition: devour raw meat and fowl (of savages)

茹苦含辛.definition: bitter hardship; to bear one's cross

茹葷飲酒.definition: to eat meat and drink wine

茹誌鵑.definition: Ru Zhijuan (1925-1998), female novelist and politician
